resources.string:
Hi, my name is Gustavo. 

I am a web developer, live in Osasco-SP - Brazil. 

I love technology, passionate about mobile development, fascinated by the embedded features and the numerous possibilities that these features can generate as a solution. 

Programming in kotlin is a lot of fun, it's very curious to know even more about this programming language. 

My goal is to become a senior-level professional, and become a reference on the subject for the whole world.
